markdownRemark.excerpt: This week I have been working a webpage for counters to submit counts. It’s a simple layout - all timeslots are listed with their respective sessions under it…
markdownRemark.html: This week I have been working a webpage for counters to submit counts. It’s a simple layout - all timeslots are listed with their respective sessions under it. Users can click on a session, and input fields come up for submitting a count.
